mapper.sql: id, investment_advisor AS investmentAdvisor, last_period_customers_number AS lastPeriodCustomersNumber, current_period_customers_number AS currentPeriodCustomersNumber, last_period_registered_customers_number AS lastPeriodRegisteredCustomersNumber, current_period_registered_customers_number AS currentPeriodRegisteredCustomersNumber, last_period_transaction_customers_number AS lastPeriodTransactionCustomersNumber, current_period_transaction_customers_number AS currentPeriodTransactionCustomersNumber, current_period_registered_customers_proportion AS currentPeriodRegisteredCustomersProportion, customer_registration_growth_rate AS customerRegistrationGrowthRate, current_period_transactions_customers_proportion AS currentPeriodTransactionsCustomersProportion, customer_transaction_conversion_rate AS customerTransactionConversionRate, current_period_customers_aum_growth_rate AS currentPeriodCustomersAumGrowthRate, mtime, ctime
